name: elevate
description: Elevate your training experience and goals! Track your fitness and progressions over time. Analyse deeper your activities. And more...

scripts.assert-app-exists:
node -e "if ((require('fs').existsSync('./dist/app/')) === false) {console.log('Please run & wait for 'npm start' task before.



');process.exit(1);}";
scripts.build:metadata: node -e "console.log('{\"commit\": \"' + require('child_process').execSync('git rev-parse HEAD').toString().trim() + '\", \"date\": \"' + (new Date()).toISOString() + '\"}')" > build_metadata.json
scripts.build:appcore@dev: npm run build:metadata && cd ../appcore/ && node ./node_modules/@angular/cli/bin/ng --version && node ./node_modules/@angular/cli/bin/ng build --outputPath=../desktop/dist/app/ --base-href --configuration=desktop
scripts.package:windows: npm-run-all clean build:electron@prod build:appcore@prod && electron-builder build --windows --x64
scripts.package:linux: npm-run-all clean build:electron@prod build:appcore@prod && electron-builder build --linux --x64
scripts.watch: npm run clean && npm-run-all --print-label --race --parallel watch:electron watch:appcore
